name: Mars Incorporated
goal: Mars, Incorporated is a private, family-owned business with more than a century of history and some of the best-loved brands in the world including M&M’S®, PEDIGREE®, DOUBLEMINT® and UNCLE BEN’S®. Headquartered in McLean, VA, Mars has more than $35 billion in sales from six diverse business segments: Petcare, Chocolate, Wrigley, Food, Drinks and Symbioscience. More than 85,000 Associates across 73 countries are united by the company’s Five Principles: Quality, Efficiency, Responsibility, Mutuality and Freedom and strive every day to create relationships with stakeholders that deliver growth we are proud of as a company.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Audiovisual and Media, Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Internal Market, Public Health, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Circular Economy Package & clean energy package, particularly the Waste Framework Directive and Packaging and Packaging Waste Directive; Food safety (contaminant additives); Unfair trading practices; Brexit; Corporate taxation; Nutrition labelling; International trade;
EU Joint action on Childhood obesity; Dual quality;
Consumer protection; New technologies in food; Pet food related legislation
